outdoorvets.com/2009/02/field-use-of-iso.snippet: ABSTRACT Anesthesia equipment has been modified to permit the delivery of isoflurane in ambient air as the carrier and to be fitted with circuitry adaptable for different species and anesthetic situations for field operations.
